import React from 'react' import Typist from 'react-typist' const Opportunities = () => ( <>
#HireADragon

For Drexel students looking for a co-op or internship!

  • A large number of Drexel students have lost their co-ops recently due to the CoViD-19 situation
  • The co-ops carry credits and are a must to be completed successfully to graduate
  • For many, co-ops are more than just internships, and are a source of income to pay off part of their tuition
    • ) export default Opportunities
